100101.name: Frigid Cold Arrow
100101.simple_desc: Deals minor Ice DMG to a single enemy.
100101.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to #1[i]% of March 7th's ATK to a single enemy.

100102.name: The Power of Cuteness
100102.simple_desc: Provides a single ally with a Shield.
100102.desc:
Provides a single ally with a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to #1[i]% of March 7th's DEF plus #4[i] for #2[i] turn(s).
If the ally's current HP percentage is #3[i]% or higher, greatly increases the chance of enemies attacking that ally.

100103.name: Glacial Cascade
100103.simple_desc: Deals Ice DMG to all enemies, with a chance of Freezing them.
100103.desc:
Deals Ice DMG equal to #1[i]% of March 7th's ATK to all enemies. Hit enemies have a #2[i]% base chance to be Frozen for #3[i] turn(s).
While Frozen, enemies cannot take action and will receive Additional Ice DMG equal to #4[i]% of March 7th's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

100104.name: Girl Power
100104.desc: After a Shielded ally is attacked by an enemy, March 7th immediately Counters, dealing Ice DMG equal to #1[i]% of her ATK. This effect can be triggered #2[i] time(s) each turn.

100106.name: Attack
100106.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

100107.name: Freezing Beauty
100107.desc:
Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, there is a #1[i]% base chance to Freeze a random enemy for #2[i] turn(s).
While Frozen, the enemy cannot take action and will take Additional Ice DMG equal to #3[i]% of March 7th's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

100201.name: Cloudlancer Art: North Wind
100201.simple_desc: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single enemy.
100201.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to #1[i]% of Dan Heng's ATK to a single enemy.

100202.name: Cloudlancer Art: Torrent
100202.simple_desc: Deals Wind DMG to a single enemy. Upon a CRIT Hit, there is a high chance of Slowing the enemy.
100202.desc:
Deals Wind DMG equal to #1[i]% of Dan Heng's ATK to a single enemy.
On a CRIT Hit, there is a #4[i]% base chance to reduce the target's SPD by #2[i]% for #3[i] turn(s).

100203.name: Ethereal Dream
100203.simple_desc: Deals massive Wind DMG to a single enemy. If the enemy is Slowed, DMG multiplier dealt will be increased.
100203.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to #1[i]% of Dan Heng's ATK to a single enemy. If the enemy is Slowed, the Ultimate's DMG multiplier increases by #2[i]%.

100204.name: Superiority of Reach
100204.desc: When Dan Heng is the target of an ally's Ability, his next attack's Wind RES PEN increases by #1[i]%. This effect can be triggered again after #2[i] turn(s).

100206.name: Attack
100206.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

100207.name: Splitting Spearhead
100207.desc: After Dan Heng uses his Technique, his ATK increases by #1[i]% at the start of the next battle for #2[i] turn(s).

100301.name: Sawblade Tuning
100301.simple_desc: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single enemy.
100301.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to #1[i]% of Himeko's ATK to a single enemy.

100302.name: Molten Detonation
100302.simple_desc: Deals Fire DMG to a single enemy and minor Fire DMG to enemies adjacent to it.
100302.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to #1[i]% of Himeko's ATK to a single enemy and Fire DMG equal to #2[i]% of Himeko's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

100303.name: Heavenly Flare
100303.simple_desc: Deals Fire DMG to all enemies and regenerates Energy if enemies are defeated.
100303.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to #1[i]% of Himeko's ATK to all enemies. Himeko regenerates #2[i] extra Energy for each enemy defeated.

100304.name: Victory Rush
100304.desc:
When an enemy is inflicted with Weakness Break, Himeko gains 1 point of Charge (max #2[i] points).
If Himeko is fully Charged when an ally performs an attack, Himeko immediately performs 1 follow-up attack and deals Fire DMG equal to #1[i]% of her ATK to all enemies, consuming all Charge points.
At the start of the battle, Himeko gains 1 point of Charge.

100306.name: Attack
100306.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

100307.name: Incomplete Combustion
100307.desc: After using Technique, creates a dimension that lasts for #4[i] second(s). After entering battle with enemies in the dimension, there is a #1[i]% base chance to increase Fire DMG taken by enemies by #2[i]% for #3[i] turn(s). Only 1 dimension created by allies can exist at the same time.

100401.name: Gravity Suppression
100401.simple_desc: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to a single enemy.
100401.desc: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to #1[i]% of Welt's ATK to a single enemy.

100402.desc: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to #1[i]% of Welt's ATK to a single enemy and further deals DMG 2 extra times, with each time dealing Imaginary DMG equal to #1[i]% of Welt's ATK to a random enemy. On hit, there is a #2[i]% base chance to reduce the enemy's SPD by #3[i]% for #4[i] turn(s).

100403.name: Synthetic Black Hole
100403.simple_desc: Deals Imaginary DMG to all enemies, with a high chance of Imprisoning them.
100403.desc:
Deals Imaginary DMG equal to #1[i]% of Welt's ATK to all enemies, with a #3[i]% base chance for enemies hit by this ability to be Imprisoned for 1 turn.
Imprisoned enemies have their actions delayed by #2[i]% and SPD reduced by #4[i]%.

100404.name: Time Distortion
100404.desc: When hitting an enemy that is already Slowed, Welt deals Additional Imaginary DMG equal to #1[i]% of his ATK to the enemy.

100406.name: Attack
100406.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

100407.name: Gravitational Imprisonment
100407.desc:
After using Welt's Technique, create a dimension that lasts for #4[i] second(s). Enemies in this dimension have their Movement SPD reduced by #5[i]%. After entering battle with enemies in the dimension, there is a #1[i]% base chance to Imprison the enemies for 1 turn.
Imprisoned enemies have their actions delayed by #2[i]% and SPD reduced by #3[i]%. Only 1 dimension created by allies can exist at the same time.

100501.name: Midnight Tumult
100501.simple_desc: Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single enemy.
100501.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to #1[i]% of Kafka's ATK to a single enemy.

100502.name: Caressing Moonlight

Deals Lightning DMG equal to #1[i]% of Kafka's ATK to a target enemy and Lightning DMG equal to #3[i]% of Kafka's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.
If the target enemy is currently receiving DoT, all DoTs currently placed on that enemy immediately produce DMG equal to #2[i]% of their original DMG.

100503.name: Twilight Trill

100503.desc:
Deals Lightning DMG equal to #1[i]% of Kafka's ATK to all enemies, with a #2[i]% base chance for enemies hit to become Shocked and immediately take DMG equal to #5[i]% of the DoT. Shock lasts for #3[i] turn(s).
While Shocked, enemies receive Lightning DoT equal to #4[i]% of Kafka's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

100504.name: Gentle but Cruel
100504.desc: After an ally of Kafka's uses Basic ATK on an enemy, Kafka immediately launches 1 follow-up attack and deals Lightning DMG equal to #1[i]% of her ATK to that enemy, with a base chance of #4[i]% of increasing the DoT inflicted by #2[i]% for #3[i] turns. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per turn.

100506.name: Attack
100506.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

100507.name: Mercy Is Not Forgiveness
100507.desc:
Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Lightning DMG equal to #4[i]% of Kafka's ATK to a random enemy. In addition, all enemies have a #1[i]% base chance to become Shocked for #3[i] turn(s).
While Shocked, enemies receive Lightning DoT equal to #2[i]% of Kafka's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

100601.name: System Warning
100601.simple_desc: Deals minor Quantum DMG to a single enemy.
100601.desc: Deals Quantum DMG equal to #1[i]% of Silver Wolf's ATK to a single enemy.

100602.name: Allow Changes?
100602.simple_desc: Deals Quantum DMG to a single enemy and has a chance to inflict extra Weakness.
100602.desc:
Deals Quantum DMG equal to #1[i]% of Silver Wolf's ATK to a single target enemy, with a #2[i]% base chance to inflict the target with 1 Weakness of the same Type as a random ally's ATK Type for #3[i] turn(s), and reduces the enemy's DMG RES to that ATK Type by #4[i]%.
In addition, there is a #5[i]% base chance to reduce the DMG RES of the enemy by #6[f1]% for #7[i] turn(s).

100603.name: User Banned
100603.simple_desc: Deals massive Quantum DMG to a single enemy, with a high chance of decreasing their DEF.
100603.desc: There's a #2[i]% base chance to decrease the enemy target's DEF by #3[i]% for #4[i] turn(s). And at the same time, deals #1[i]% of Silver Wolf's ATK as Quantum DMG to the target enemy.

100604.name: Awaiting System Response...
100604.desc:
Silver Wolf can create three types of Bugs: Reduce ATK by #1[f1]%, reduce DEF by #2[f1]%, and reduce SPD by #3[f1]%.
Every time Silver Wolf attacks, she has a #4[i]% base chance to implant a random Bug that lasts for #5[i] turn(s) in the enemy target.

100606.name: Attack
100606.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

100607.name: Force Quit Program
100607.desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, ignores Weakness Types and reduces Toughness from all enemies. Enemies with their Weakness Broken in this way will trigger the Quantum Weakness Break effect.

100801.name: Lightning Rush

100801.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to #1[i]% of Arlan's ATK to a single enemy.

100802.desc: Consumes Arlan's HP equal to #1[i]% of his Max HP to deal Lightning DMG equal to #2[i]% of Arlan's ATK to a single enemy. If Arlan does not have sufficient HP, his HP will be reduced to 1 after using his Skill.

100803.name: Frenzied Punishment
100803.simple_desc: Deals massive Lightning DMG to a single enemy and Lightning DMG to enemies adjacent to it.
100803.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to #1[i]% of Arlan's ATK to a single enemy and Lightning DMG equal to #2[i]% of Arlan's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

100804.name: Pain and Anger
100804.desc: Increases Arlan's DMG for every percent of HP below his Max HP, up to a max of #1[i]% more DMG.

100806.name: Attack
100806.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

100807.name: Swift Harvest
100807.desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Lightning DMG equal to #1[i]% of Arlan's ATK to all enemies.

100901.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to #1[i]% of Asta's ATK to a single enemy.

100902.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to #1[i]% of Asta's ATK to a single enemy and further deals DMG for 4 extra times, with each time dealing Fire DMG equal to #1[i]% of Asta's ATK to a random enemy.

100903.name: Astral Blessing
100903.desc: Increases SPD of all allies by #1[i] for #2[i] turn(s).

100904.name: Astrometry
100904.desc:
Gains 1 stack of Charging for every different enemy hit by Asta plus an extra stack if the enemy hit has Fire Weakness.
For every stack of Charging Asta has, all allies' ATK increases by #1[f1]%, up to #2[i] time(s).
Starting from her second turn, Asta's Charging stack count is reduced by #3[i] at the beginning of every turn.

100906.name: Attack
100906.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

100907.name: Miracle Flash
100907.desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Fire DMG equal to #1[i]% of Asta's ATK to all enemies.

101301.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to #1[i]% of Herta's ATK to a single enemy.

101302.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to #1[i]% of Herta's ATK to all enemies. If the enemy's HP percentage is #2[i]% or higher, DMG dealt to this target increases by #3[i]%.

101303.name: It's Magic, I Added Some Magic
101303.simple_desc: Deals Ice DMG to all enemies.
101303.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to #1[i]% of Herta's ATK to all enemies.

101304.name: Fine, I'll Do It Myself
101304.desc: When an ally's attack causes an enemy's HP percentage to fall to #1[i]% or lower, Herta will launch a follow-up attack, dealing Ice DMG equal to #2[i]% of Herta's ATK to all enemies.

101306.name: Attack
101306.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

101307.name: It Can Still Be Optimized
101307.desc: After using her Technique, Herta's ATK increases by #1[i]% for #2[i] turn(s) at the beginning of the next battle.

110101.name: Windrider Bullet
110101.simple_desc: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single enemy.
110101.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to #1[i]% of Bronya's ATK to a single enemy.

110102.name: Combat Redeployment
110102.simple_desc: Removes 1 debuff from a single ally, increases their DMG, and allows them to immediately take action.
110102.desc:
Dispels a debuff from a single ally, allows them to immediately take action, and increases their DMG by #1[i]% for #3[i] turn(s).
When this Skill is used on Bronya herself, she cannot immediately take action again.

110103.name: The Belobog March
110103.simple_desc: Increases ATK and CRIT DMG of all allies.
110103.desc: Increases the ATK of all allies by #1[i]%, and increases their CRIT DMG equal to #2[f1]% of Bronya's CRIT DMG plus #3[f1]% for #4[i] turn(s).

110104.name: Leading the Way
110104.desc: After using her Basic ATK, Bronya's next action will be Advanced Forward by #1[i]%.

110106.name: Attack
110106.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

110107.name: Banner of Command
110107.desc: After using Bronya's Technique, at the start of the next battle, all allies' ATK increases by #1[i]% for #2[i] turn(s).

110201.name: Thwack

110201.desc: Deals Quantum DMG equal to #1[i]% of Seele's ATK to a single enemy.

110202.name: Sheathed Blade

110202.desc: Increases Seele's SPD by #2[i]% for #3[i] turn(s) and deals Quantum DMG equal to #1[i]% of Seele's ATK to a single enemy.

110203.name: Butterfly Flurry
110203.simple_desc: Enters the buffed state and deals massive Quantum DMG to a single enemy.
110203.desc: Seele enters the buffed state and deals Quantum DMG equal to #1[i]% of her ATK to a single enemy.

110204.name: Resurgence
110204.desc:
Enters the buffed state upon defeating an enemy with Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate, and receives an extra turn. While in the buffed state, the DMG of Seele's attacks increases by #1[i]% for #2[i] turn(s).
Enemies defeated in the extra turn provided by "Resurgence" will not trigger another "Resurgence."

110206.name: Attack
110206.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

110207.name: Phantom Illusion
110207.desc: After using her Technique, Seele gains Stealth for #1[i] second(s). While Stealth is active, Seele cannot be detected by enemies. And when entering battle by attacking enemies, Seele will immediately enter the buffed state.

110301.name: Roaring Thunderclap
110301.simple_desc: Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single enemy.
110301.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to #1[i]% of Serval's ATK to a single enemy.

110302.name: Lightning Flash

110302.desc:
Deals Lightning DMG equal to #1[i]% of Serval's ATK to a single enemy and Lightning DMG equal to #2[i]% of Serval's ATK to enemies adjacent to it, with a #3[i]% base chance for enemies hit to become Shocked for #4[i] turn(s).
While Shocked, enemies take Lightning DoT equal to #5[i]% of Serval's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

110303.name: Here Comes the Mechanical Fever
110303.simple_desc: Deals Lightning DMG to all enemies and increases the duration of Shock.
110303.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to #1[i]% of Serval's ATK to all enemies. Enemies already Shocked will extend the duration of their Shock state by #2[i] turn(s).

110304.name: Galvanic Chords
110304.desc: After Serval attacks, deals Additional Lightning DMG equal to #1[i]% of Serval's ATK to all Shocked enemies.

110306.name: Attack
110306.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

110307.name: Good Night, Belobog
110307.desc:
Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Lightning DMG equal to #4[i]% of Serval's ATK to a random enemy, with a #1[i]% base chance for all enemies to become Shocked for #3[i] turn(s).
While Shocked, enemies will take Lightning DoT equal to #2[i]% of Serval's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

110401.name: Fist of Conviction
110401.simple_desc: Deals minor Ice DMG to a single enemy.
110401.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to #1[i]% of Gepard's ATK to a single enemy.

110402.name: Daunting Smite
110402.simple_desc: Deals Ice DMG to a single enemy, with a chance of Freezing them.
110402.desc:
Deals Ice DMG equal to #1[i]% of Gepard's ATK to a single enemy, with a #2[i]% base chance to Freeze the enemy for #3[i] turn(s).
While Frozen, the enemy cannot take action and will take Additional Ice DMG equal to #4[i]% of Gepard's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

110403.name: Enduring Bulwark
110403.desc: Applies a Shield to all allies, absorbing DMG equal to #1[i]% of Gepard's DEF plus #3[i] for #2[i] turn(s).

110404.name: Unyielding Will
110404.desc: When struck with a killing blow, instead of becoming knocked down, Gepard's HP immediately restores to #1[i]% of his Max HP. This effect can only trigger once per battle.

110406.name: Attack
110406.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

110407.name: Comradery
110407.desc: After Gepard uses his Technique, when the next battle begins, a Shield will be applied to all allies, absorbing DMG equal to #1[i]% of Gepard's DEF plus #3[i] for #2[i] turn(s).

110501.name: Behind the Kindness
110501.simple_desc: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single enemy.
110501.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to #1[i]% of Natasha's ATK to a single enemy.

110502.name: Love, Heal, and Choose
110502.simple_desc: Restores a single ally's HP and continuously heals them.
110502.desc: Restores a single ally for #1[f1]% of Natasha's Max HP plus #4[i]. Restores the ally for another #2[f1]% of Natasha's Max HP plus #5[i] at the beginning of each turn for #3[i] turn(s).

110503.name: Gift of Rebirth
110503.desc: Heals all allies for #1[f1]% of Natasha's Max HP plus #2[i].

110504.name: Innervation
110504.desc: When healing allies with HP percentage at #1[i]% or lower, increases Natasha's Outgoing Healing by #2[i]%. This effect also works on continuous healing.

110506.name: Attack
110506.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

110507.name: Hypnosis Research
110507.desc:
Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Physical DMG equal to #4[i]% of Natasha's ATK to a random enemy, with a #1[i]% base chance to Weaken all enemies.
While Weakened, enemies deal #2[i]% less DMG to allies for #3[i] turn(s).

110601.name: Frost Shot
110601.simple_desc: Deals minor Ice DMG to a single enemy.
110601.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to #1[i]% of Pela's ATK to a single target enemy.

110602.name: Frostbite
110602.simple_desc: Removes 1 buff and deals Ice DMG to a single enemy.
110602.desc: Removes #2[i] buff(s) and deals Ice DMG equal to #1[i]% of Pela's ATK to a single target enemy.

110603.name: Zone Suppression
110603.simple_desc: Has a high chance of lowering enemies' DEF and deals minor Ice DMG to all enemies.
110603.desc:
Deals Ice DMG equal to #4[i]% of Pela's ATK to all enemies, with a #1[i]% base chance to inflict Exposed on all enemies.
When Exposed, enemies' DEF is reduced by #2[i]% for #3[i] turn(s).

110604.name: Data Collecting
110604.desc: If the enemy is debuffed after Pela's attack, Pela will restore #1[f1] extra Energy. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per attack.

110606.name: Attack
110606.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

110607.name: Preemptive Strike
110607.desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. Upon entering battle, Pela deals Ice DMG equal to #4[i]% of her ATK to a random enemy, with a #1[i]% base chance of lowering the DEF of all enemies by #2[i]% for #3[i] turn(s).

110701.name: I Want to Help
110701.simple_desc: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single enemy.
110701.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to #1[i]% of Clara's ATK to a single enemy.

110702.name: Svarog Watches Over You
110702.simple_desc: Deals minor Physical DMG to all enemies. Deals minor extra Physical DMG to targets carrying Mark of Counter.
110702.desc:
Deals Physical DMG equal to #1[i]% of Clara's ATK to all enemies, and additionally deals Physical DMG equal to #2[i]% of Clara's ATK to enemies marked by Svarog with a Mark of Counter.
All Marks of Counter will be removed after this Skill is used.

110703.name: Promise, Not Command
110703.simple_desc: Increases DMG RES and chance to be attacked by enemies, and enhances the Counter effect.
110703.desc:
After Clara uses Ultimate, DMG dealt to her is reduced by an extra #4[i]%, and she has greatly increased chances of being attacked by enemies for #3[i] turn(s).
In addition, Svarog's Counter is enhanced. When an ally is attacked, Svarog immediately launches a Counter, and its DMG multiplier against the enemy increases by #2[i]%. Enemies adjacent to it take 50% of the DMG dealt to the target enemy. Enhanced Counter(s) can take effect #5[i] time(s).

110704.name: Because We're Family
110704.desc: Under the protection of Svarog, DMG taken by Clara when hit by enemy attacks is reduced by #3[i]%. Svarog will mark enemies who attack Clara with his Mark of Counter and retaliate with a Counter, dealing Physical DMG equal to #2[i]% of Clara's ATK.

110706.name: Attack
110706.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

110707.name: A Small Price for Victory
110707.desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. Upon entering battle, the chance Clara will be attacked by enemies increases for #1[i] turn(s).

110801.name: Dazzling Blades
110801.simple_desc: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single enemy.
110801.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to #1[i]% of Sampo's ATK to a single enemy.

110802.name: Ricochet Love
110802.simple_desc: Deals minor Wind DMG to single enemy targets with 5 Bounces in total.
110802.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to #2[i]% of Sampo's ATK to a single enemy, and further deals DMG for #1[i] extra time(s), with each time dealing Wind DMG equal to #2[i]% of Sampo's ATK to a random enemy.

110803.name: Surprise Present
110803.simple_desc: Deals Wind DMG to all enemies with a high chance to increase the DoT dealt to the targets.
110803.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to #1[i]% of Sampo's ATK to all enemies, with a #4[i]% base chance to increase the targets' DoT taken by #2[i]% for #3[i] turn(s).

110804.name: Windtorn Dagger
110804.desc:
Sampo's attacks have a #1[i]% base chance to inflict Wind Shear for #3[i] turn(s).
Enemies inflicted with Wind Shear will take Wind DoT equal to #2[i]% of Sampo's ATK at the beginning of each turn. Wind Shear can stack up to #4[i] time(s).

110806.name: Attack
110806.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

110807.name: Shining Bright
110807.desc:
After Sampo uses his Technique, enemies in a set area are inflicted with Blind for #1[i] second(s). Blinded enemies cannot detect your team.
When initiating combat against a Blinded enemy, there is a #2[i]% fixed chance to delay all enemies' action by #3[i]%.

110901.name: Hehe! Don't Get Burned!
110901.simple_desc: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single enemy.
110901.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to #1[i]% of Hook's ATK to a single enemy.

110902.name: Hey! Remember Hook?
110902.simple_desc: Deals Fire DMG to a single enemy, with a high chance to inflict Burn on the enemy.
110902.desc:
Deals Fire DMG equal to #1[i]% of Hook's ATK to a single enemy. In addition, there is a #2[i]% base chance to inflict Burn for #3[i] turn(s).
When afflicted with Burn, enemies will take Fire DoT equal to #4[i]% of Hook's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

110903.name: Boom! Here Comes the Fire!
110903.simple_desc: Deals massive Fire DMG to a single enemy and Enhances Hook's next Skill.
110903.desc:
Deals Fire DMG equal to #1[i]% of Hook's ATK to a single enemy.
After using Ultimate, the next Skill to be used is Enhanced, which deals DMG to a single enemy and enemies adjacent to it.

110904.name: Ha! Oil to the Flames!
110904.desc: When attacking a target afflicted with Burn, deals Additional Fire DMG equal to #1[i]% of Hook's ATK and regenerates #2[i] extra Energy.

110906.name: Attack
110906.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

110907.name: Ack! Look at This Mess!
110907.desc:
Immediately attacks the enemy. Upon entering battle, Hook deals Fire DMG equal to #4[i]% of her ATK to a random enemy. In addition, there is a #1[i]% base chance to inflict Burn on every enemy for #3[i] turn(s).
When afflicted with Burn, enemies will take Fire DoT equal to #2[i]% of Hook's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

110909.name: Hey! Remember Hook?
110909.simple_desc: Deals Fire DMG to a single enemy with a high chance of inflicting Burn, also deals minor Fire DMG to enemies adjacent to it.
110909.desc:
Deals Fire DMG equal to #1[i]% of Hook's ATK to a single enemy, with a #2[i]% base chance to Burn them for #3[i] turn(s). Additionally, deals Fire DMG equal to #5[i]% of Hook's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.
When afflicted with Burn, enemies will take Fire DoT equal to #4[i]% of Hook's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

120101.name: Flower Pick
120101.simple_desc: Tosses a tile to deal minor Quantum DMG to a single enemy.
120101.desc: Tosses 1 jade tile from the suit with the fewest tiles in hand to deal Quantum DMG equal to #1[i]% of Qingque's ATK to a single enemy.

120102.name: A Scoop of Moon
120102.simple_desc: Draw Tile, increases Qingque's DMG, and this turn does not end.
120102.desc: Immediately draws #1[i] jade tile(s) and increases DMG by #2[i]% until the end of the current turn. This effect can stack up to #3[i] time(s). The turn will not end after this Skill is used.

120103.name: A Quartet? Woo-hoo!
120103.simple_desc: Deals Quantum DMG to all enemies, then obtains 4 tiles of the same suit.
120103.desc: Deals Quantum DMG equal to #1[i]% of Qingque's ATK to all enemies, and obtain 4 jade tiles of the same suit.

120104.name: Celestial Jade
120104.desc:
When an ally's turn starts, Qingque randomly draws 1 tile from 3 different suits and can hold up to 4 tiles at one time.
If Qingque starts her turn with 4 tiles of the same suit, she consumes all tiles to enter the "Hidden Hand" state.
While in this state, Qingque cannot use her Skill again. At the same time, Qingque's ATK increases by #1[i]%, and her Basic ATK "Flower Pick" is enhanced, becoming "Cherry on Top!" The "Hidden Hand" state ends after using "Cherry on Top!".

120106.name: Attack
120106.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

120107.name: Game Solitaire
120107.desc: After using Technique, Qingque draws #1[i] jade tile(s) when the battle starts.

120108.name: Cherry on Top!
120108.simple_desc: Deals Quantum DMG to a single enemy and minor Quantum DMG to enemies adjacent to it.
120108.desc:
Deals Quantum DMG equal to #1[i]% of Qingque's ATK to a single enemy, and deals Quantum DMG equal to #2[i]% of Qingque's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.
"Cherry on Top!" cannot recover Skill Points.

120201.name: Dislodged
120201.simple_desc: Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single enemy.
120201.desc: Tingyun deals Lightning DMG equal to #1[i]% of her ATK to a single enemy.

120202.name: Soothing Melody
120202.simple_desc: Increases the ATK of a single ally and grants them Benediction.
120202.desc:
Grants a single ally with Benediction to increase their ATK by #2[i]%, up to #4[i]% of Tingyun's current ATK.
When the ally with Benediction attacks, they will deal Additional Lightning DMG equal to #1[i]% of that ally's ATK for 1 time.
Benediction lasts for #3[i] turn(s) and is only effective on the most recent receiver of Tingyun's Skill.

120203.name: Amidst the Rejoicing Clouds
120203.simple_desc: Regenerates Energy for a single ally and increases their DMG dealt.
120203.desc: Regenerates #1[i] Energy for a single ally and increases the target's DMG by #3[i]% for #2[i] turn(s).

120204.name: Violet Sparknado
120204.desc: When an enemy is attacked by Tingyun, the ally with Benediction immediately deals Additional Lightning DMG equal to #1[i]% of that ally's ATK to the same enemy.

120206.name: Attack
120206.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

120207.name: Gentle Breeze
120207.desc: Tingyun immediately regenerates #1[i] Energy upon using her Technique.

120301.name: Thorns of the Abyss
120301.simple_desc: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to a single enemy.
120301.desc: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to #1[i]% of Luocha's ATK to a single enemy.

120302.name: Prayer of Abyss Flower
120302.simple_desc: Restores a single ally's HP and gains 1 stack of Abyss Flower.
120302.desc:
After using his Skill, immediately restore a single ally's HP equal to #1[i]% of Luocha's ATK plus #2[i]. Meanwhile, Luocha gains 1 stack of Abyss Flower.
When any ally's HP percentage drops to #3[i]% or lower, Luocha will immediately use his Skill one time on this ally (without consuming Skill Points). After Luocha takes action for #4[i] more time(s), this effect can be triggered again when the conditions are met.

120303.name: Death Wish
120303.simple_desc: Removes 1 buff from the target, deals Imaginary DMG to all enemies, and gains 1 stack of Abyss Flower.
120303.desc: Removes #2[i] enemy buff(s) and deals Imaginary DMG equal to #1[i]% of Luocha's ATK to all enemies. Luocha gains 1 stack of Abyss Flower.

120304.name: Cycle of Life
120304.desc:
When Abyss Flower is at #1[i] stacks, Luocha consumes all stacks to deploy a Field against the enemy.
When any enemy in the Field is attacked by an ally, the attacking ally immediately restores HP equal to #2[f1]% of Luocha's ATK plus #4[i].
The Field's effect lasts #3[i] turn(s).

120306.name: Attack
120306.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

120307.name: Mercy of a Fool
120307.desc: After using Technique, at the start of the next battle, Talent will be immediately triggered.

120401.name: Glistening Light
120401.simple_desc: Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single enemy.
120401.desc: Jing Yuan deals Lightning DMG equal to #1[i]% of his ATK to a single enemy.

120402.name: Rifting Zenith
120402.simple_desc: Deals minor Lightning DMG to all enemies and increases Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action.
120402.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to #1[i]% of Jing Yuan's ATK to all enemies and increases Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action by #2[i] for the next turn.

120403.name: Lightbringer
120403.simple_desc: Deals Lightning DMG to all enemies and increases Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action.
120403.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to #1[i]% of Jing Yuan's ATK to all enemies and increases Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action by #2[i] for the next turn.

120404.name: Prana Extirpated
120404.desc:
Summons Lightning-Lord at the start of the battle. Lightning-Lord has #1[i] base SPD and #4[i] base Hits Per Action. When the Lightning-Lord takes action, its hits are considered as follow-up attacks, with each hit dealing Lightning DMG equal to #2[i]% of Jing Yuan's ATK to a random single enemy, and enemies adjacent to it also receive Lightning DMG equal to #5[i]% of the DMG dealt to the target enemy.
The Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action can reach a max of #6[i]. Every time Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action increases by 1, its SPD increases by #3[i]. After the Lightning-Lord's action ends, its SPD and Hits Per Action return to their base values.
When Jing Yuan is knocked down, the Lightning-Lord will disappear.
When Jing Yuan is affected by Crowd Control debuff, the Lightning-Lord is unable to take action.

120406.name: Attack
120406.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

120407.name: Spirit Invocation
120407.desc: After the Technique is used, the Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action in the first turn increases by #1[i] at the start of the next battle.

120601.name: Cloudfencer Art: Starshine
120601.simple_desc: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single enemy.
120601.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to #1[i]% of Sushang's ATK to a single enemy.

120602.name: Cloudfencer Art: Mountainfall
120602.simple_desc: Deals Physical DMG to a single enemy with a small chance of triggering Sword Stance. If the enemy has Weakness Break, Sword Stance is guaranteed to trigger.
120602.desc:
Deals Physical DMG equal to #1[i]% of Sushang's ATK to a single enemy. In addition, there is a #3[i]% chance to trigger Sword Stance on the final hit, dealing Additional Physical DMG equal to #2[i]% of Sushang's ATK to the enemy.
If the enemy is inflicted with Weakness Break, Sword Stance is guaranteed to trigger.

120603.name: Shape of Taixu: Dawn Herald
120603.simple_desc: Deals massive Physical DMG to a single enemy, enhances Sword Stance's effect, and takes action immediately.
120603.desc:
Deals Physical DMG equal to #1[i]% of Sushang's ATK to a single enemy and immediately Advances her action forward by 100%. In addition, Sushang's ATK increases by #4[i]% and using her Skill has 2 extra chances to trigger Sword Stance for #2[i] turn(s).
Sword Stance triggered from the extra chances deals #3[i]% of the original DMG.

120604.name: Dancing Blade
120604.desc: When an enemy has their Weakness Broken on the field, Sushang's SPD increases by #1[f2]% for #2[i] turn(s).

120606.name: Attack
120606.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

120607.name: Cloudfencer Art: Warcry
120607.desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. Upon entering battle, Sushang deals Physical DMG equal to #1[i]% of her ATK to all enemies.

120901.name: Frost Thorn
120901.simple_desc: Deals minor Ice DMG to a single enemy.
120901.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to #1[i]% of Yanqing's ATK to a single enemy.

120902.name: Darting Ironthorn
120902.simple_desc: Deals Ice DMG to a single enemy and activates the Soulsteel Sync.
120902.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to #1[i]% of Yanqing's ATK to a single enemy and activates Soulsteel Sync for 1 turn.

120903.name: Amidst the Raining Bliss
120903.simple_desc: Increases Yanqing's CRIT Rate. Enhances "Soulsteel Sync" and deals massive Ice DMG to a single enemy.
120903.desc: Increases Yanqing's CRIT Rate by #1[i]%. When Soulsteel Sync is active, increases Yanqing's CRIT DMG by an extra #2[i]%. This buff lasts for one turn. Afterwards, deals Ice DMG equal to #3[i]% of Yanqing's ATK to a single enemy.

120904.name: One With the Sword
120904.desc:
When Soulsteel Sync is active, Yanqing is less likely to be attacked by enemies. Yanqing's CRIT Rate increases by #1[f1]% and his CRIT DMG increases by #2[i]%. After Yanqing attacks an enemy, there is a #3[i]% fixed chance to perform a follow-up attack, dealing Ice DMG equal to #4[i]% of Yanqing's ATK to the enemy, which has a #6[i]% base chance to Freeze the enemy for 1 turn.
The Frozen target cannot take action and receives Additional Ice DMG equal to #5[i]% of Yanqing's ATK at the beginning of each turn.
When Yanqing receives DMG, the Soulsteel Sync effect will disappear.

120906.name: Attack
120906.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

120907.name: The One True Sword
120907.desc: After using his Technique, at the start of the next battle, Yanqing deals #2[i]% more DMG for #3[i] turn(s) to enemies whose current HP is #1[i]% or higher.

121101.name: Diagnostic Kick
121101.simple_desc: Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single enemy.
121101.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to #1[i]% of Bailu's ATK to a single enemy.

121102.name: Singing Among Clouds
121102.simple_desc: Restores HP for a single ally, then heals random allies.
121102.desc: Heals a single ally for #1[f1]% of Bailu's Max HP plus #2[i]. Bailu then heals random allies #4[i] time(s). After each healing, HP restored from the next healing is reduced by #3[i]%.

121103.name: Felicitous Thunderleap
121103.simple_desc: Restores HP for all allies, and grants them Invigoration, or prolongs the duration of their Invigoration.
121103.desc:
Heals all allies for #1[f1]% of Bailu's Max HP plus #2[i].
Bailu applies Invigoration to allies that are not already Invigorated. For those already Invigorated, Bailu extends the duration of their Invigoration by 1 turn.
The effect of Invigoration can last for #3[i] turn(s). This effect cannot stack.

121104.name: Gourdful of Elixir
121104.desc:
After an ally with Invigoration is hit, restores the ally's HP for #1[f1]% of Bailu's Max HP plus #2[i]. This effect can trigger #5[i] time(s).
When an ally receives a killing blow, they will not be knocked down. Bailu immediately heals the ally for #3[i]% of Bailu's Max HP plus #4[i] HP. This effect can be triggered 1 time per battle.

121106.name: Attack
121106.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

121107.name: Saunter in the Rain
121107.desc: After using Technique, at the start of the next battle, all allies are granted Invigoration for #1[i] turn(s).

800101.name: Farewell Hit
800101.simple_desc: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single enemy.
800101.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to #1[i]% of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy.

800102.name: RIP Home Run
800102.simple_desc: Deals Physical DMG to a single enemy and enemies adjacent to it.
800102.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to #1[i]% of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy and enemies adjacent to it.

800103.name: Stardust Ace
800103.simple_desc: Uses Single Target ATK or Blast to strike with full force.
800103.desc:
Choose between two attack modes to deliver a full strike.
Blowout: Farewell Hit deals Physical DMG equal to #1[i]% of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy.
Blowout: RIP Home Run deals Physical DMG equal to #2[i]% of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy, and Physical DMG equal to #3[i]% of the Trailblazer's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

800104.name: Perfect Pickoff
800104.desc: Each time after this character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, ATK increases by #1[i]%. This effect stacks up to #2[i] time(s).

800106.name: Attack
800106.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

800107.name: Immortal Third Strike
800107.desc: Immediately heals all allies for #1[i]% of their respective Max HP after using this Technique.

800108.name: Blowout: Farewell Hit
800108.simple_desc: Deals massive Physical DMG to a single enemy.
800108.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to #1[i]% of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy.

800109.name: Blowout: RIP Home Run
800109.simple_desc: Deals Physical DMG to a single enemy and enemies adjacent to it.
800109.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to #1[i]% of Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy and Physical DMG equal to #2[i]% of Trailblazer's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

800201.name: Farewell Hit
800201.simple_desc: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single enemy.
800201.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to #1[i]% of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy.

800202.name: RIP Home Run
800202.simple_desc: Deals Physical DMG to a single enemy and enemies adjacent to it.
800202.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to #1[i]% of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy and enemies adjacent to it.

800203.name: Stardust Ace
800203.simple_desc: Uses Single Target ATK or Blast to strike with full force.
800203.desc:
Choose between two attack modes to deliver a full strike.
Blowout: Farewell Hit deals Physical DMG equal to #1[i]% of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy.
Blowout: RIP Home Run deals Physical DMG equal to #2[i]% of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy, and Physical DMG equal to #3[i]% of the Trailblazer's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

800204.name: Perfect Pickoff
800204.desc: Each time after this character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, ATK increases by #1[i]%. This effect stacks up to #2[i] time(s).

800206.name: Attack
800206.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

800207.name: Immortal Third Strike
800207.desc: Immediately heals all allies for #1[i]% of their respective Max HP after using this Technique.

800208.name: Blowout: Farewell Hit
800208.simple_desc: Deals massive Physical DMG to a single enemy.
800208.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to #1[i]% of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy.

800209.name: Blowout: RIP Home Run
800209.simple_desc: Deals Physical DMG to a single enemy and enemies adjacent to it.
800209.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to #1[i]% of Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy and Physical DMG equal to #2[i]% of Trailblazer's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

800301.name: Ice-Breaking Light
800301.simple_desc: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single enemy and gains Magma Will.
800301.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to #1[i]% of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy and gains 1 stack of Magma Will.

800302.name: Ever-Burning Amber
800302.simple_desc: Reduces DMG taken and gains Magma Will, with a high chance to Taunt all enemies.
800302.desc: Increases the Trailblazer's DMG Reduction by #1[i]% and gains 1 stack of Magma Will, with a #2[i]% base chance to Taunt all enemies for #3[i] turn(s).

800303.name: War-Flaming Lance
800303.simple_desc: Deals Fire DMG to all enemies and enhances the next Basic ATK.
800303.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to #1[i]% of the Trailblazer's ATK plus #2[i]% of the Trailblazer's DEF to all enemies. The next Basic ATK will be automatically enhanced and does not cost Magma Will.

800304.name: Treasure of the Architects
800304.desc:
Each time the Trailblazer is hit, they gain 1 stack of Magma Will for a max of #3[i] stack(s).
When Magma Will has no fewer than 4 stacks, the Trailblazer's Basic ATK becomes enhanced, dealing DMG to a single enemy and enemies adjacent to it.
When the Trailblazer uses Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate, apply a Shield to all allies that absorbs DMG equal to #1[f1]% of the Trailblazer's DEF plus #4[i]. The Shield lasts for #2[i] turn(s).

800306.name: Attack
800306.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

800307.name: Call of the Guardian
800307.desc: After using Technique, at the start of the next battle, gains a Shield that absorbs DMG equal to #1[i]% of the Trailblazer's DEF plus #2[i] for #3[i] turn(s).

800308.name: Ice-Breaking Light
800308.simple_desc: Consumes Magma Will, then deals Fire DMG to a single enemy and minor Fire DMG to enemies adjacent to it.
800308.desc: Consumes 4 stacks of Magma Will to enhance Basic ATK, dealing Fire DMG equal to #1[i]% of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy and Fire DMG to equal to #2[i]% of the Trailblazer's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

800401.name: Ice-Breaking Light
800401.simple_desc: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single enemy and gains Magma Will.
800401.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to #1[i]% of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy and gains 1 stack of Magma Will.

800402.name: Ever-Burning Amber

800402.desc: Increases the Trailblazer's DMG Reduction by #1[i]% and gains 1 stack of Magma Will, with a #2[i]% base chance to Taunt all enemies for #3[i] turn(s).

800403.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to #1[i]% of the Trailblazer's ATK plus #2[i]% of the Trailblazer's DEF to all enemies. The next Basic ATK will be automatically enhanced and does not cost Magma Will.

800404.desc:
Each time the Trailblazer is hit, they gain 1 stack of Magma Will for a max of #3[i] stack(s).
When Magma Will has no fewer than 4 stacks, the Trailblazer's Basic ATK becomes enhanced, dealing DMG to a single enemy and enemies adjacent to it.
When the Trailblazer uses Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate, apply a Shield to all allies that absorbs DMG equal to #1[f1]% of the Trailblazer's DEF plus #4[i]. The Shield lasts for #2[i] turn(s).

800406.name: Attack
800406.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

800407.name: Call of the Guardian
800407.desc: After using Technique, at the start of the next battle, gains a Shield that absorbs DMG equal to #1[i]% of the Trailblazer's DEF plus #2[i] for #3[i] turn(s).

800408.simple_desc: Consumes Magma Will, then deals Fire DMG to a single enemy and minor Fire DMG to enemies adjacent to it.
800408.desc: Consumes 4 stacks of Magma Will to enhance Basic ATK, dealing Fire DMG equal to #1[i]% of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy and Fire DMG to equal to #2[i]% of the Trailblazer's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.
